sentences.cn: …专业运动员和业余赛跑运动员。

sentences.en: A professional golfer usually has it all over an amateur.
sentences.cn: 职业高尔夫球员通常胜过业余的.

sentences.en: Acting with an amateur theatrical group can be fun.
sentences.cn: 和业余戏剧团一起演出可能是有趣的.

sentences.en: Although Tom's only an amateur he's a first - class player.
sentences.cn: 虽然汤姆只是个业余爱好者,但却是 一流 的高手.

sentences.en: An amateur shouldn't play roulette for high stakes.
sentences.cn: 外行不该下大赌注赌轮盘赌.

sentences.en: Angela says she longs to join an amateur dramatics class.
sentences.cn: 安杰拉说她渴望参加业余戏剧班。

sentences.en: He has that je ne sais quoi that distinguishes a professional from an amateur.
sentences.cn: 他有那种难以言表的特质，体现出他是专业而非业余的。

sentences.en: He is an amateur in boxing.
Hill considered Sam a lightweight, a real amateur.
sentences.cn: 希尔认为萨姆无足轻重，是个十足的生手。

sentences.en: I always was good at amateur theatricals.
Jerry is an amateur who dances because he feels like it.
sentences.cn: 杰里是个业余跳舞爱好者，他跳舞是因为自己喜欢。

sentences.en: Mickelson won his first major golf tournament while still an amateur.
sentences.cn: 米克尔森还是业余选手时就赢得了他第一个高尔夫球锦标赛大奖。

sentences.en: Taylor began his playing career as an amateur goalkeeper.
sentences.cn: 泰勒的运动生涯是从一名业余守门员开始的。

sentences.en: The Amateur Softball Association's roster of umpires has declined to 57,000.
sentences.cn: 业余垒球协会的裁判员名单上的人数已经减少到了57,000名。

sentences.en: There's a big difference between an amateur video and a slick Hollywood production.
sentences.cn: 业余人士拍摄的视频片段和制作精良的好莱坞影片之间存在着巨大的差距。

sentences.en: Tony Woodcock has joined German amateur team SC Brueck as coach.
sentences.cn: 托尼·伍德科克加盟德国业余队SC布吕克队担任教练。

sentences.en: You English are a bunch of amateurs when it comes to romance.
sentences.cn: 谈情说爱你们英国人就外行了。

words.tran_cn: 业余的；不熟练的；外行的
业余性；非职业的作为；业余特点；业余主义

phrases.tran_cn: 业余无线电；业余无线电爱好者

trans.tran_en: Amateur sports or activities are done by people as a hobby and not as a job

trans.tran_cn: 业余爱好者/运动员，外行
trans.tran_en: someone who does an activity just for pleasure, not as their job
someone who does an activity just for pleasure, not as their job
